timeline.bodyText: any particular reason to use org.slf4j.event.Level here instead of org.apache.logging.log4j.Level?
timeline.author: azagrebin

replies.bodyText: yes, to ensure we don't spread log4j compile dependencies to other modules.
replies.author: zentol

timeline.bodyText: maybe then just e.g. a ConcurrentLinkedQueue?
timeline.author: azagrebin

replies.bodyText: I ran into weird consistency issues on the way and this was the first solution that worked. I'll try ConcurrentLinkedQueue again, maybe the cause was something else.
replies.author: zentol
